attributes.action: Get Ian Duncan Smith To Leave Multiple Sclorisis Sufferers Alone
attributes.additional_details: MS attacks the nervous system and spinal cord sending mixed messages to the brain which it also attacks. We canal suffer from various degrees of pain which can be unbearable to constant numbness and pins and needles which never go away
attributes.background: Ian Duncan Smith is unfairly treating MS sufferers with the new PIP system and other disabled people. Just because MS is Invisible he does not understand the pain and suffering we go through on a daily basis and how difficult it is for MS sufferers to do even the most simple daily chore

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. Petitions need to contain a specific request for action.

It is clear that you are concerned about how changes to the PIP system are affecting MS sufferers. You could start a petition asking for specific changes to the PIP system which you think would make it more suitable for MS sufferers.
